item.description:
We will be meeting the 1st and 3rd Sunday of each month, 6:00-8:00 or so, with the option of increasing to weekly meetings if we have enough interest for this.

Our next meetup, 10/5/08, will include an audio tape providing an overview of the Course and we will begin discussing the Text. I am including a link below where you can access pdf files of the 1972 version of the Course. Please read and print out Chapter 1, Introduction to Miracles, and bring it with you. This will ensure that we are all working with the same material. We will discuss some of the history and controversy that surrounds the various "editions" of the Course as well.

http://www.acimfind.i...

If you have difficulty accessing this, please e-mail me and I will send you the file directly.

Hope to see you there, Theresa

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Glastonbury A Course In Miracles Study Group October Meetup
